fullText: Cole Escola's brilliant comedy 'Oh, Mary!' is the funniest show on Broadway right now, a raunchy reimagining of Mary Todd Lincoln as a boozy, fame-hungry diva.
dtliExcerpt: Cole Escola's brilliant comedy 'Oh, Mary!' is the funniest show on Broadway right now, a raunchy reimagining of Mary Todd Lincoln as a boozy, fame-hungry diva.
